Title: Act of Contrition
Plot: After a flight deck accident kills 13 pilots and wounds many others, Kara is thrust into service as a flight instructor and ordered to turn a group of civilian pilots and academy washouts into full-fledged Viper pilots.
GuestStars: Donnelly Rhodes, Jill Teed, Aaron Douglas, Tobias Mehler, Colby Johannson, Bill Meilen, Bodi Olmos, Luciana Carro, Terry Chen
